page.shortlink: UX Repeating Sections Has Add Row button
page.description: Defines if the repeating section should have an 'Add Row' button.
page.discussion: Specify if the repeating section has a button to add new rows to the repeating section. If this option is checked, the following properties are exposed:

item.name: ['Add Row' icon]
item.description: The icon shown for the 'Add Row' button.

item.name: ['Add Row' bubble help]
item.description: The bubble help shown for the 'Add Row' button.

link.link: UX Repeating Sections Add Row icon
UX Repeating Sections Add Row bubble help

UX Repeating Sections Add Row bubble help
